name: Stockpile (itch) (Spanospy)
description:
Submission for the Games that Shouldn't Be Games Jam 2022

What started as browsing an asset pack ended up being this low-quality joke that probably doesn't fit the theme massively well.

▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔

To:

From: J&J Warehouse Co.

Subject: MANDATORY EMERGENCY HIRE

▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔

Greetings,

Due to a staff shortage, you've been selected as a security guard for one of our storage warehouses. Your job is to protect the facility against thieves, the military, extra-terrestrial aliens and other threats!

Just kidding, all you're gonna do is sit around for a full 24 hours. But don't worry, we've left you a radio.

Your contract starts and ends on the 1st of April 2022 only. 

Make sure you clock in for your shift, and don't be late! 

~J&J Warehouse Co. Automated Workforce System

▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔
